sp_widget.name: About Me
sp_widget.template:
About me

Fast Learner. Detail Oriented. Reliable and Professional.

Through my experience, I've developed both a robust background in modern technologies as well as a depth of practical knowledge in managing clients, engagement models, and creation and maintenance of successful processes and documentation.

In the past half-decade in DC I've been most heavily involved in extensive modernization efforts for multiple governmental agencies (primarily the GSA and the FCC), chiefly acting as the technical lead on application re-engineering projects while also consulting and building towards a robust overall system architecture roadmap.

  • Email: triplett@alum.mit.edu
